description: This file defines a function to add items to a shopping list within an agent context, and initializes an agent instance with specific configurations, then performs an action and prints the session state.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with session state, tools, and model configuration.

methods.name: add_item
methods.description: Adds an item to the shopping list in the agent's session state and raises StopAgentRun if the list has fewer than 3 items.
